# isInstanceOf() function
<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@esdmr/assert/types](./esdmr.assert.types.md) &gt; [isInstanceOf](./esdmr.assert.types.isinstanceof.md)


Asserts that the given value is an instance of a constructor.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isInstanceOf<T>(value: unknown, Constructor: TypedConstructor<T>, detail?: string, ...args: unknown[]): asserts value is T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | unknown | Value to assert. |
|  Constructor | [TypedConstructor](./esdmr.assert.types.typedconstructor.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The constructor to check value with. |
|  detail | string | Extra description. |
|  args | unknown\[\] | Format arguments. |

<b>Returns:</b>

asserts value is T
